DOC.brief_summary: The Astra Tech Osseospeed Profile Implant design when placed in the healed extraction site maintains the marginal bone level
DOC.brief_title: Clinical and Radiological Outcomes Study on Astra Tech Osseospeed Tx Profile Implant
DOC.criteria: Patients with single missing maxillary or mandibular premolar or molar The edentulous sites should be healed sites The opposing tooth will be a natural dentition general contraindications to dental implant surgery Patient with irradiation in the head and neck region Immunosuppressed or immunocompromised patients Patients who took or are taking aminobisphosphonates Patients with poor oral hygiene and motivation Patients with untreated periodontitis Uncontrolled diabetes Pregnancy or lactation Addiction to alcohol or other drugs patients with psychiatric problems Lack of occluding dentition/prosthesis Restricted mouth opening (less than 3.5cm interarch anteriorly) Patients with an acute or chronic infection/inflammation in the area intended for implant placement Patients unable to commit 5 years follow up Patients referred for implant placement only
